com.facebook.react.packagerconnection

类 ReconnectingWebSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • okhttp3.WebSocketListener
      • com.facebook.react.packagerconnection.ReconnectingWebSocket

  • public final class ReconnectingWebSocket
extends okhttp3.WebSocketListener
    A wrapper around WebSocketClient that reconnects automatically
